channel.title: Need Help
channel.description: I just recently started my first server, and I have a few questions, Its up and running but im not exactly sure how to give myself owner or make it to where others can get on it, any help would be greatly appreciated. =(

item.title: Need Help
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

Making yourself owner-Go to your source files>characters>click your name and look for rights. Set the rights to 0 for regular player, 1 for moderator, 2 for admin, 3 for owner, and 4 for hidden admin. For others to get on you must have port forwarded and change the client IP address to yours. Also you must have a no-ip.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic
